mapper.insert: insert into culture (num,writer,subject,passwd,ref,re_step,re_level,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from culture) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{passwd} ,(select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from culture) ,1,0,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.update: update enter set down=down+1 where num=#{num}
update enter set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into culture_comment (comment_num,culture_num,writer,content) values ((select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from culture_comment) , #{culture_num}, #{writer}, #{content})

insert into enter (num,writer,subject,passwd,ref,re_step,re_level ,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from culture) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{passwd} ,#{ref},#{re_step},#{re_level} ,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.select: select passwd from culture where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.update: update culture set show='n' where num=#{num}
mapper.select:
select num,writer,subject,reg_date,readcount ,filename,filesize,down,re_level ,(select count(*) from culture_comment where culture_num=num) comment_count, show from culture
where ${search_option} like #{keyword} and show='y'
where ( writer like #{keyword} or subject like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} ) and show='y'
order by ref desc, re_step
